name: Telegram Voice Chat Music Player UserBot (VC-UserBot) ™Ꭰᥲʀκ͢☢Ӄᴎ͟͞ɪ͟͞ԍ͟͞ʜ͟͞ᴛ]™❂​ꪀꪖ​ꪜꪖ​ꪀ𝓳ꪖ​ꪀꪖ 𝘴ꪖ𝓽​ꫝ𝘴𝓲​ꪀ​ᦔꪊ༒
description: Telegram UserBot to Play Audio in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

SESSION_NAME.description: Session string, read the README to learn how to export it with Pyrogram

PLUGIN.description: Voice Chat Smart Plugin to enable, must be one of: player/channel/recorder/radio
